KD Kanwar Reviews.Text: I had the pleasure of working with Kanwardeep Kanwar, a Mortgage Specialist at the BMO Shoppers World branch. His professionalism and assistance were truly remarkable. Kanwardeep recently helped me secure a mortgage without a single hassle or issue. His expertise and dedication to his work were evident throughout the entire process. I am so impressed with his services that I wholeheartedly recommend him to all my family and friends. Kanwardeep's commitment to ensuring a smooth and stress-free mortgage experience is truly commendable, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the results.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Kanwardeep. From the moment I met him he made sure he answers all my questions promptly and got the best available rate and term.
He demonstrated professionalism, patience, and a genuine commitment to helping me find the best mortgage solution.
What sets him apart is his experience and knowledge which makes the entire mortgage process smooth and hassle-free from the start till closing.
I would highly recommend Kanwardeep to anyone who need mortgage specialist. If I have to go with Kanwardeep again, I won't hesitate for a second.

Kanwardeep was a joy to work with on my recent transaction. He was very patient, taking his time to explain every phase of the transaction and he made sure the deal went through without any hitches. KD is a super guy, highly recommend!!

Mr. KD is highly professional in his work. He is quite responsive and provides valuable inputs on the situation. He explains in detailed, works hard, honest and ethical. He responds to our questions immediately. He is very dependable and would go with him each time I look for mortgage here in Canada. I wish you all the success. I would strongly recommend him to anyone seeking good mortgage deals. The best thing about KD is he listens and has a lot of patience.

As a Realtor, I have dealt with lot of Mortgage agents both for myself and my clients but when I came across and talked to Kanwardeep the best thing I found which other agents lack is proper communication skills. I found Kanwardeep very soft spoken and detail oriented. The level of patience in explaining the procedure and discussing the options that can be considered is remarkable and outstanding. I truly appreciate his services and would definitely recommend him to anyone looking  for a mortgage specialist. Great job Kanwardeep and thank you.
A very knowledgeable professional with customer first approach.

We had very good experience with KD as mortgage specialist. He gave excellent advise about mortgage as well insurance as an advisor. He is very professional & gentle person to deal with  it. His expertise & good knowledge about market & know how to deal with approved mortgage application. I would suggest his name  to any one  who wants smooth, hassle-free mortgage application.

Had a fantastic experience with KD, our mortgage specialist. Extremely professional, knowledgeable about the market, and highly responsive. Highly recommend. We are very grateful and happy with his service

We had very good experience working with KD as our mortgage specialist. Very professional and gentle person to deal with. He responds immediately for all the requests. Highly recommend Kanwar for your mortgage requirements.

Kanwardeep is very talented mortgage specialist and provide clients with clarity to great extent. He is good listener, answers all queries and guide clients through his experience. He is calm and professional. I would recommend him to anyone.

We recently had the pleasure of working with Kanwardeep as our BMO Mortgage Specialist, and I can confidently say that he exceeded all our expectations. One aspect that truly impressed us was Kanwardeep's attention to detail. He meticulously reviewed all the necessary paperwork, leaving no room for errors or oversights. This level of thoroughness gave us confidence in the accuracy and completeness of our mortgage application. Kanwardeep's expertise and diligence were instrumental in securing the best possible mortgage terms for us.

Working with Kanwardeep as my Mortgage Specialist was an exceptional experience from start to finish. His expertise and dedication made the entire mortgage process smooth and hassle-free. From our initial consultation to the final closing, Kanwardeep demonstrated professionalism, patience, and a genuine commitment to helping me find the best mortgage solution.
Kanwardeep's knowledge of the mortgage industry and his ability to explain complex concepts in a simple and clear manner impressed me greatly.  Throughout the process, he remained readily available to address any questions or concerns I had, promptly responding to my emails and calls.
What sets Kanwardeep apart is his unwavering commitment to his clients' satisfaction. He went above and beyond to ensure that I secured a mortgage that aligned with my needs . He diligently explored various options, explaining the pros and cons of each, and provided personalized recommendations tailored to my situation. I would highly recommend Kanwardeep Kanwar to anyone in need of a knowledgeable and trustworthy Mortgage Specialist.
Recently got the mortgage approved at Bmo by Kanwar ji , he guided and supported through the whole process and gave genuine advice . Thank you for assisting in our first home mortgage!!

Mr Kanwar helped me right throughout the mortgage process step by step. He has very good knowledge and understanding of my mortgage needs. His approach to problem solving and advice during my mortgage process are commendable. He has excellent interpersonal skills and is very approachable. I recommend his services 100%.

My experience dealing with Kanwardeep has been exceptional. He was patient, resourceful and very professional in providing advise that helped me make informed decision when purchasing my house. He goes the extra mile to ensure customer satisfaction. I will definitely do business with him again and I will refer my friends and family too.
Excellent service.

I recently had the pleasure of working with a mortgage adviser, KD (Kanwardeep Kanwar), and I have to say that the service and personal attention he provided was truly exceptional. From the moment we met with him, we knew that we were in good hands.

KD's knowledge of the local and national market is second to none and he was committed to finding us the best possible rate for our dream home. As first-time home buyers, we were new to the process, and KD was there for us every step of the way. He made sure we were informed and educated on each step of the buying process, which really put our minds at ease.

One of the things I appreciated most about KD was his responsiveness. He was always available to answer any questions we had, and his support and guidance were invaluable throughout the entire process.

Overall, I am incredibly grateful that we chose KD's services and would highly recommend him to anyone in the market for a mortgage adviser. He truly goes above and beyond for his clients and we couldn't be happier with the experience we had working with him.

I had a great pleasure to work with KD to apply for a mortgage. Unlike many others he didn’t make us to run around to get various documents. He was very meticulous and detail oriented and willing to listen to his clients. After I submitted my documents he was able to secure the mortgage in less than week which rarely happens in the mortgage application process. Even after closing he followed up to check if the closing went smoothly and if we need any more help. Following through even after the work is completed is something most people won’t do. If I have to go with KD I won’t hesitate for a second.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Mr. KD to secure a mortgage for my new home, who gave exceptional attention to detail, which was especially important during the mortgage approval process. He was able to anticipate any potential issues and took proactive steps to ensure that my mortgage was approved smoothly and efficiently. Overall, I would highly recommend Mr. KD to anyone in need of a mortgage. Thank you, Mr. KD, for making the mortgage process so smooth and stress-free!

KD helped me with my mortgage and he was a pleasure to work with. He made the entire process simple and easy to understand by explaining everything clearly. I highly recommend him for anyone looking for a mortgage

I was recommended to speak with Mr. Kanwardeep Kanwar, BMO for my baking needs from a friend who had used his services as her regular banker was away..She spoke so highly about Mr. Kanwar that I decided to call him ..Not only did he exceed my expectations, he called me every step of the way to let me know where he was in the progress and my next steps..I honestly don’t like to write reviews but he has been so amazing during this process I had to..If you want someone to listen to you, offer you the best advice for your situation and work hard and efficient then Mr. Kanwar is the person you want working for you and on your side.

I was introduced to Kanwardeep (better known as KD), through my friend and had the privilege of meeting and working with him for the renewal/refinancing of my home, in January 2021. Though I had met and spoken to quite a few different bank agents by then and was quite stressed by the whole process and undecided in my decision making, my meeting with KD was unlike any other. With his quiet and gentle demeanour, KD has a calming effect on his clients. He was very understanding and assuring at every step and went out his way, to make our experience a great one. He always answered our phone calls on the first ring and was never tired of repeating himself and asking us to rest assured that he would get us the best rate. He did an outstanding job to get us an incredible rate of 1.7% for a 5 year fixed term, even as the rates started climbing.

I reached out to Kanwar last minute on a Saturday after bank hours as I was coming close to my closing date for my pre construction home and my previous broker had let me down. Working 9 to 5pm or longer daily I had no time to meet anyone during bank hours. Kanwar answered my request immediately and was able to meet me near my house at a coffee shop. He gave me lots of options as I was struggling and he got to work right away. He worked tirelessly with the bank and myself getting all the documents we needed to get our approval in time. I am so happy with the service and that we were able to secure my new home. I will definitely refer all friends and family to Kanwar moving forward. It is clear when you speak with him that he has many years of experience and many deals under his belt that similar to my experience and maybe yours too that he can offer insight.
